resources.string: I am currently speaking about VectorDrawable at %2$s %3$s
The SVG Path specification can be found at http://mark.al/1IDy4t8 %3$s
For a more complex example of a VectorDrawable check out http://mark.al/13OzTlG %3$s
For another path tracing example take a look at http://mark.al/1CuxisQ %3$s
For further explanation of square to triangle path transformations see http://mark.al/1I2uxj3 %3$s
See the plus to minus animation in action on a FAB at http://mark.al/1Lp0c2N %3$s
The full post on animating the Android logo is at see http://mark.al/13SLK1Y %3$s
The series on isometric animation starts at http://mark.al/isometricAVD %3$s
The presentation source is at http://mark.al/10c1fPT and the articles are at http://mark.al/1turq1F %3$s
Path: Alphas, trimPath, Line cap / join / miter|Group: translate, scale
